title: What are the advantages of publishing a research paper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Among the obligations of a scientist are the following: Accomplish technically competent, thorough, and ethical research Employ objective scientific judgment and seek appropriate advice. Publish honest reports in a timely fashion. The benefits of publishing a research paper include: To think more clearly. To fulfill the responsibility to report and share information with the scientific community. To produce a final product of a successful research project. To achieve personal gain, establish oneself as an expert, and receive grants and promotions. Publications are the currency of the world of science.

When you are publishing research paper (Original which you written by researching any element or thing or model) you may have chance to focus on future for further research by continuation of the present research paper. For promotions in your research work, or as a faculty, is depend on number of paper publications and where you published the paper. If your paper going to publish in publication of good impact factor then you have real knowledge about your research and even a single paper is enough to push you forward more than 80% in your growth. Minimum research papers need to publish for M.Phil is 1 and P.Hd is 3.
